sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_22045
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/CPD/Evo/inc/CPD_Task.h line 142 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/CPD/Evo/test/swut/CPD_Task.c.test line 267 The cyclic call shall be implemented in the following order by the SWC supplier: 0. cyclic_zkmebintpre 1. cyclic_zv 2. cyclic_dwa 3. cyclic_kft 4. cyclic_qtg 5. cyclic_cpd
ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_22045 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_9768
sect2.para: Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/CPD/Evo/inc/CPD_Task.h line 142 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/CPD/Evo/src/CPD_Task.c line 105 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/CPD/Evo/test/swut/CPD_Task.c.test line 268 In the RUN mode, the SW of the supplier shall execute the cyclic runnables with a cycle time of 10ms for the runnables specified in SWR_ICAS1_GW_9769 and SWR_ICAS1_GW_20015. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_9768 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_GW_9770
sect2.para: Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/CPD/Evo/inc/CPD_Task.h line 142 Requirement is satisfied here: ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/CPD/Evo/src/CPD_Task.c line 105 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/CPD/Evo/test/swut/CPD_Task.c.test line 269 the cyclic call shall be called strictly one after the other and the platform chorus shall ensure that the shared input data does not change during the call cycle. ID: SWR_ICAS1_GW_9770 _ObjectType: Requirement ASIL: QM

sect2.title: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1450
sect2.para:
Requirement is satisfied here: ./ComponentDesign.markdown line 147 Requirement is satisfied here: ./ComponentDesign.markdown line 286 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/CPD/Evo/test/swut/CPD_Integration.c.test line 71 Requirement is verified here: TEST ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/CPD/Evo/test/swut/CPD_Integration.c.test line 77 Requirement is verified here: DESCRIPTION ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/CPD/Evo/test/swut/CPD_Integration.c.test line 82 Requirement is verified here: TRACE ../../../../../../../../sw.sys.chorus_main_build/mc_sw/appl/ZV_Lib/CPD/Evo/test/swut/CPD_Integration.c.test line 86 NVM block shall be configured as below, allowing CPD to store:
- the CPD state (port NvCpdZustand, 1 byte) - external states (port NvCpdExtZust√§nde, 4 bytes)
Note: The SW-component CPD requires blocks in the non-volatile memory, according to the definition in the ARXML-file
ID: SWR_ICAS1_L3_ZV_1450 _ObjectType: Non Functional Requirement ASIL: QM
